channel.title: Anim help [667/728]
channel.description:
How would I go about setting the animations for weapons during combat, such as the whip attacking, or the barrelchest anchor, etc.? I can't find a "combatAssistant.java" or anything of the sort.
The source is ZenithScape, if that matters.
